text: Armando Calderón Sol (June 24, 1948 – October 9, 2017) was a Salvadorian politician. He served as President of El Salvador from June 1, 1994 to June 1, 1999, representing the Nationalist Republican Alliance (ARENA). Calderón Sol died on 9 October 2017 of lung cancer at a Houston, Texas hospital at the age of 69. ==References== ==Other websites== * https://web.archive.org/web/20030207070924/http://archive.laprensa.com.sv/19990703/ * Extended biography of Armando Calderón Sol at Fundación CIDOB Category:1949 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Texas Category:Presidents of El Salvador
title: Armando Calderón Sol
